name: kvision-sandbox
description: Whenever you want to produce a minified "production" version of your code pass in `-Pproduction=true` or `-Pprod=true` to your build command. ### Resource Processing * generatePotFile - Generates a `src/main/resources/i18n/messages.pot` translation template file. ### Running * run - Starts a webpack dev server on port 3000. ### Packaging * browserWebpack - Bundles the compiled js files into `build/distributions` * zip - Packages a zip archive with all required files into `build/libs/*.zip`
